item.title: Creating a NestJS application
item.description: Creating a “complete” NestJS application What is nestjs Creating a project Adding controllers Adding services Http test Add TypeORM Configuration Add a post subscriber and index content with elastic search. Docker and Docker compose During this pandemic with the free time, I and some friends wanted to do a side project to improve our skills and know new technologies and frameworks. IÂ´ll focus on what would be this project, but after a few talks we decided to do it, using react native and NodeJs in the backend.
